abstract: Microsoft said it had agreed to acquire MultiMap, an online map service based in London, in an attempt to compete more effectively with the search services of Google and to collect more revenue from online and mobile advertising.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft said it had agreed to acquire MultiMap, an online map service based in London, in an attempt to compete more effectively with the search services of Google and to collect more revenue from online and mobile advertising.

headline.main: In Its Race Against Google, Microsoft Buys MultiMap
